name: BlackJack in cmd
description:
This is a simple version of BlackJack.

Now with money!!!

Warning:

1) the game is case-sensitive!

2) You must enter whole numbers

V.1 is the basic version without money.

V.2 is the upgraded version with money.

Code:

https://github.com/matty147/BlackJack

know bugs:

The game crashes when a letter is entered into the bet option.

Too big numbers crash the game when entered anywhere.
